author: Jose Quesada jose.quesada@gorillalogic.com
description: Cypress end-to-end test automation boilerplate. Using ES Modules, Chai and Should.
name: cypress-es-modules-chai-should

scripts.mochawesome:merge: npx mochawesome-merge "cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json" > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.cypress:run:all: npm run prereport && npx cypress run --headless --browser chrome
scripts.cypress:run:e2e: npm run prereport && npx cypress run --headless --browser chrome --env grepTags="e2e"
scripts.cypress:run:api: npm run prereport && npx cypress run --headless --browser chrome --env grepTags="api"
scripts.cypress:all: npm run cypress:run:all; npm run mochawesome:merge; npm run junit:merge
scripts.cypress:api: npm run cypress:run:api; npm run processReports
scripts.cypress:e2e: npm run cypress:run:e2e; npm run mochawesome:merge; npm run junit:merge
scripts.processReports: npm run mochawesome:merge; npm run junit:merge
